title: Dunderklumpen
creator_credit: Paulette Rubinstein, Lynn Manwaring and G G Communications
brief_description: A magical trip into fantasyland, with Dunderklumpen and his mysterious friends who appear on a night filled with magic. Features a mixture of animation and real characters. Based on the original Swedish version, produced by Gunnar Karisson and directed by Per Ahlin. This American version is dubbed into English.
